parts:
Project Description: AI-Powered Quiz Generator for Training

Imagine you're a teacher, and I, as your student, provide a topic or upload a file (PDF, DOC, TXT, etc.). Based on the material or topic, you will automatically generate quiz questions for me. These questions will follow the requirements I specify, such as:

    Quiz Format: The quiz can include:
        Multiple-choice questions: You will provide several options, with one or more of the options being the correct answer.
        True/False questions: Depending on the requirement, some questions may be in the true/false format.

    Input Requirements: When I make a request, I will specify:
        The topic or file to base the quiz on (e.g., "math", "science", or a document).
        The number of questions I want.
        The difficulty level I need, such as "easy," "medium," or "hard."
        The type of questions I prefer, either multiple-choice or true/false.

    Output: Based on the input provided, you will generate:
        The required number of questions.
        Multiple-choice questions with several options and one or more correct answers.
        True/false questions, if requested.
        The difficulty of the questions will match the level I specified.

This project will allow me to train AI to understand topics, extract key information, and generate suitable quiz questions based on various formats and difficulty levels.
now ask me 3 questions easy about python programing language
